subscriptions.title: TailTracker Premium (Monthly)
subscriptions.description: Unlock unlimited pet profiles, extended location history, and premium features
benefits: Unlimited pet profiles (vs 2 in free version)
Extended location history (30 days vs 7 days)

subscriptions.title: TailTracker Premium (Annual)
subscriptions.description: Save 17% with annual billing - unlock all premium features
benefits: Unlimited pet profiles (vs 2 in free version)
Extended location history (30 days vs 7 days)

autoRenewal.description: Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

managementInstructions.ios: Manage subscriptions in iOS Settings > [Your Name] > Subscriptions
managementInstructions.android: Manage subscriptions in Google Play Store > Subscriptions

billing.description: Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account (iOS) or Google Play Account (Android) at confirmation of purchase.
billing.renewalTiming: Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.

cancellation.description: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period.
cancellation.noRefund: No refunds are provided for unused portions of subscription periods.

trial.description: Free trial period ends when you purchase a subscription. Unused portion of free trial is forfeited upon purchase.
trial.autoConversion: Free trial automatically converts to paid subscription unless cancelled before trial period ends.

dataCollection.purchaseHistory: Purchase information is collected to manage subscriptions and provide customer support
dataCollection.subscriptionStatus: Subscription status is tracked to enable premium features
dataCollection.billingDetails: Billing is processed by Apple/Google - TailTracker does not store payment information

familySharing.description: Premium subscriptions can be shared with family members through Family Sharing (iOS) or Google Play Family Library (Android)
familySharing.limitations: Family sharing subject to platform terms and conditions

appStoreGuidelines.guideline3_1_1: Uses Apple's payment system for digital content

googlePlayPolicy.billingAPI: Uses Google Play Billing Library v5+
googlePlayPolicy.subscriptionModel: Complies with subscription and cancellation policies

appStore.testAccounts: Configure sandbox test accounts in App Store Connect
appStore.testProducts: Test all subscription flows in TestFlight

googlePlay.testTracks: Use internal testing track for purchase testing
googlePlay.billingTesting: Test with Google Play Billing Library test cards
